meanings.definition: The quality or state of being illimitable.
meanings.sent1: The illimitableness of the ocean amazed the young explorer.
meanings.sent2: The illimitableness of the sky filled her with wonder.
meanings.sent3: The illimitableness of the buffet at the party left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared with the illimitableness of a bird in flight.
meanings.sent5: The illimitableness of the desert stretched out before them, vast and endless.

meanings.definition: The property of being limitless or boundless.
meanings.sent1: The illimitableness of his imagination knew no bounds.
meanings.sent2: The illimitableness of the universe is a concept that boggles the mind.
meanings.sent3: The illimitableness of the chocolate supply at the store made her smile.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was as vast as the illimitableness of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The illimitableness of possibilities in life is both exciting and daunting.
